newsitem.title: USA: Security Dynamics buys security co.
newsitem.headline: Security Dynamics buys security co.

text.p: Security Dynamics Technologies Inc said Tuesday it has acquired DynaSoft AB, a provider of security solutions for protecting access to corporate information and applications, for about $115 million.

Security Dynamics issued or reserved for issuance about 2.7 million shares of common stock in exchange for about 95% of the outstanding shares and all of the outstanding options to acquire shares of DynaSoft, which is based in Stockholm, Sweden.
Security Dynamics said it also paid about $6 million to certain stockholders of DynaSoft in exchange for the remaining outstanding shares.
The transaction is to be accounted for as a pooling of interests.
